```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(modelsummary)
```


```{r}
load("~/qmer/Data/ECLS_K/2011/eclsk_clean.Rdata")
```

```{r}
vars <- c("x1kage_r", "x_chsex_r","race", "prek",
          "x1mscalk5", "x1rscalk5", "x2sscalk5")

dat <- eclsk[ ,vars]
datasummary_skim(dat)
```

```{r}
datasummary_skim(dat, type = "categorical")
```

```{r}
datasummary_balance(~ race, data = dat, dinm = FALSE)
```
```{r}
datasummary_crosstab(race ~ x_chsex_r, data = dat)
```
